page.topic: List Control and Data Series - Using Argument Arrays in SQL Queries
page.description: You can use an IN clause with an argument array in the SQL query for a Data Series or List Control.

section.example: SELECT customerId FROM customers where country IN (:array_whatCountry)

section.description: Notice that when using an IN clause with arguments, the argument name must start with *[sql:array_]*. Also notice that the argument reference in the SQL statement is in parentheses.
